roleset.name: destroy, use up needlessly, needless use
roleset.note: WASTE-V NOTES: Based on automatic expansion of 'destroy', Levin class (cl 44). Member of Vncls consume-66-1, destroy-44, pay-68. (from waste.01-v)
WASTE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on a combination of waste-v.01 and the consume-66 and pay-68 VN classes. Corresponds to Vncls consume-66-1, destroy-44, pay-68. (from waste.01-n)
WASTING-N NOTES: Based on sentences in medpedia-part1-nouns. Comparison to 'waste.01'. See VN classes comsume-66-1 and destroy-44. Framed by Katie. (from wasting.01-n predicate notes)

roles.note: Verbnet predicts an instrumental subject. They also bring thedistinction between agent and instrument down to intentionality, whichwe've been trying to avoid. use arg2 when there is also anarg0. (from waste.01-v) Arg2 in this frame differs from the verbal frame in that it is not the instrument, but what arg1 is wasted on. (from waste.01-n)

role.descr: instrument of wasting/ destruction, wasted on/doing what (if separate from arg0)

example.name: waste-v: no instrument
example.text: Program traders argue that a reinstatement of the rule would waste the ``pricing efficiency'' of the futures and stock markets.
example.arg: the ``pricing efficiency'' of the futures and stock markets

example.name: waste-v: with instrument
example.text: Mary wasted John's fragile self-esteem with a single dirty look.

example.name: waste-n: just arg1
example.text: Her husband said voting was a waste of time .

example.name: waste-n: just arg0
example.text: Business leaders have long criticized the agency as a leading example of bureaucratic waste

example.name: waste-n: all args
example.text: The lavish privileges they have vested upon themselves, their waste of time on ceremonial banalities...

example.name: wasting-n: arg 1 following the noun (arg 1 only will be most common)
example.text: to reduce the wasting of insulin

roleset.name: destroy, use up needlessly
roleset.note: WASTEFUL-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from wasteful.01-j)

role.descr: instrument of wasting/ destruction, wasted on/doing what (if separate from arg0)

example.name: wasteful-j
example.text: Nature is wasteful of individual life.

roleset.name: drunk
roleset.note: WASTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. Comparison to drunk.01 (from wasted.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: You called me and then I called you back and you were suuuuper wasted
